title: When Riot Will put Twisted Tree Line Up
body: I just want to know when Riot is going to put Twisted Tree Line up fully for OCE

replies.body:
When the server population grows.
It's currently too small to support any queue other than Summoner's Rift and Howling Abyss full time.


If you want the other queues to come out permanently, then get all your friends and family and their friends and family to play.
Get the OCE population to at least double and we will see Twisted Treeline all the time.

> [{quoted}](name=Klavinmour,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=16BZjczY,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2014-12-25T15:24:02.738+0000)
>
> When the server population grows.
> It's currently too small to support any queue other than Summoner's Rift and Howling Abyss full time.
> 
> 
> If you want the other queues to come out permanently, then get all your friends and family and their friends and family to play.
> Get the OCE population to at least double and we will see Twisted Treeline all the time.

Yet we get %%%%ing Teambuilder (which I like), but would have reeeeeeeeeaaaaaaaally preferred TT.

Teambuiler originally came at a price, when it was first revealed it ended up showing that our server doesn't have a large enough population to handle the Normal Draft queue.

We are keeping Teambuilder now because it was seen that it can hold a healthy queue after the test with the initial opening of the Summoner's Rift update.
